textBox.richText: Ethnic Cleansing in Iraq refers here to two separate events, which will be organized better later. The first is the Al-Anfal Campaign by Saddam Hussein regime against the Kurdish people in the North of Iraq, and the second is the unmixing of ethnic and religious groups under American occupation between 2003 and 2009. I have put together some pages to start gathering information here: Ethnic Cleansing in Iraq Links Regarding Ethnic Cleansing in Iraq Bibliography of Ethnic Cleansing in Iraq Films Dealing with Genocide in Iraq
